on reading compounds: 司【シ】office (government department beneath a bureau under the ritsuryo system)
司会【シカイ】leading a meeting, presiding over a meeting, officiating at a ceremony, chairmanship, chairman, presenter, host, moderator, master of ceremonies
にぎり寿司【ニギリズシ】nigirizushi, hand-formed sushi with a topping of seafood, etc.
kun reading compounds: 司る【つかさどる】to rule, to govern, to administer
